name: Pitch Shifter
description: This algorithm performs pitch shifting using a time-domain algorithm (not employing Phase Vocoder or similar techniques). The pitch shift amount is the sum of various adjustable shift parameters and an optional CV input. It was extracted from the disting EX ‘Tracker’ algorithm, sharing a natural pairing with disting NT’s ‘Tracker’.
gui_description: The display shows the current shift amount in cents.

input_ports.name: Audio input
input_ports.description: The bus to use as the audio input.

input_ports.name: Shift input
input_ports.description: The bus to use as a V/octave pitch shift amount CV.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the pitch-shifted audio signal.
